title: India, Russia in discussions on thermonuclear research, transit potential of North sea: Rosatom CEO
description: Regarding India's long-term energy strategy and goals, the Rosatom CEO said that the company plans to have a cumulative installed capacity share of non-fossil fuel energy sources of around 50 per cent by 2030 and achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. Nuclear energy would play a significant role in attaining those goals.
